The claim states that line 17 of the: 1.9 trillion stimulus bill awards a $25 million bonus to House representatives.
The expert: s verdict confirms that the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021, signed by President Joe Biden, does not include any provisions for bonuses for House or Senate members.
A word search for: House" in the bill does not yield any results related to a bonus.
The expert explains that the: 25 million mentioned in the claim refers to the CARES Act passed in 2020, which allocated funds for the House's teleworking capabilities, equipment purchase, network improvements, House Child Care Center staff reimbursement, and House food services contracts. None of these funds were designated for member salaries.
